com.skyisland.questmanager.scheduling

Class IntervalScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skyisland.questmanager.scheduling.Scheduler
      • com.skyisland.questmanager.scheduling.IntervalScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class IntervalScheduler
extends Scheduler
    Waits a prescribed amount of time, and then ticks all registered Tickables

    • Method Detail

      • getScheduler

        public static IntervalScheduler getScheduler()
        Return the current instanced DispersedScheduler. If a scheduler has yet to be created, it will be created with default values from this call.
